verse.gurmukhi: Bwie Bgiq BY clxw hoie pwhuixcwrI[
verse.unicode: ਭਾਇ ਭਗਤਿ ਭੈ ਚਲਣਾ ਹੋਇ ਪਾਹੁਣਿਚਾਰੀ।

en.bdb: Considering himself a guest, the sikh spends his life in loving devotion.

transliteration.english: bhai bhagat bhai chalanaa hoi paahunichaaree|
transliteration.hindi: भाइ भगति भै चलणा होइ पाहुणिचारी।
transliteration.en: bhai bhagat bhai chalanaa hoi paahunichaaree|
transliteration.hi: भाइ भगति भै चलणा होइ पाहुणिचारी।
transliteration.ipa: ɓɑeɪ ɓəGət̪ ɓæ t͡ʃələɳɑ hɔeɪ pɑhʊɳɪt͡ʃɑri.
transliteration.ur: بھاا بھگت بھَے چلݨا هوا پاهُݨچاریِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: clxu jwix Ajwxu hoie ghu grbu invwrI[
verse.unicode: ਚਲਣੁ ਜਾਣਿ ਅਜਾਣੁ ਹੋਇ ਗਹੁ ਗਰਬੁ ਨਿਵਾਰੀ।

en.bdb: They (Sikhs) remain unknown to deceit and pull out ego from their minds.

transliteration.english: chalan jaan ajaan hoi gahu garab nivaaree|
transliteration.hindi: चलणु जाणि अजाणु होइ गहु गरबु निवारी।
transliteration.en: chalan jaan ajaan hoi gahu garab nivaaree|
transliteration.hi: चलणु जाणि अजाणु होइ गहु गरबु निवारी।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃələɳ d͡ʒɑɳ əd͡ʒɑɳ hɔeɪ Gəh Gərəb nɪʋɑri.
transliteration.ur: چلݨ جاݨ اجاݨ هوا گهُ گرب نواریِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurisK inq prwhuxy eyhu krxI swrI[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਨਿਤ ਪਰਾਹੁਣੇ ਏਹੁ ਕਰਣੀ ਸਾਰੀ।

en.bdb: Their true conduct is to treat themselves as guests in this world.

transliteration.english: gursikh nit paraahune eh karanee saaree|
transliteration.hindi: गुरसिख नित पराहुणे एहु करणी सारी।
transliteration.en: gursikh nit paraahune eh karanee saaree|
transliteration.hi: गुरसिख नित पराहुणे एहु करणी सारी।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəsɪkʰ nɪt̪ pərɑhʊɳe eeh kərəɳi sɑri.
transliteration.ur: گُرسکھ نت پراهُݨے اےهُ کرݨیِ ساریِ۔

en.bdb: The object of the Gurmukh is service and only such action is loved by the Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: sbid suriq ilv lIx hoie prvwr suDwrI[
verse.unicode: ਸਬਦਿ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਲੀਣ ਹੋਇ ਪਰਵਾਰ ਸੁਧਾਰੀ।

en.bdb: Merging consciousness in the Word they reform the whole family (in the form of world).

transliteration.english: sabadh surat liv leen hoi paravaar sudhaaree|
transliteration.hindi: सबदि सुरति लिव लीण होइ परवार सुधारी।
transliteration.en: sabadh surat liv leen hoi paravaar sudhaaree|
transliteration.hi: सबदि सुरति लिव लीण होइ परवार सुधारी।
transliteration.ipa: səbəd̪ sʊrət̪ lɪʋ liɳ hɔeɪ pərəʋɑr sʊt̪ɑri.
transliteration.ur: سبد سُرت لو لیِݨ هوا پروار سُدھاریِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq jwie shj Gir inrmil inrMkwrI ]4]
verse.unicode: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਜਾਇ ਸਹਜ ਘਰਿ ਨਿਰਮਲਿ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰੀ ॥੪॥

en.bdb: Through holy congregation they become pure and formless and get established in the final stage of equipoise.

transliteration.english: saadhasa(n)gat jai sahaj ghar niramal nira(n)kaaree ||4||
transliteration.hindi: साधसंगति जाइ सहज घरि निरमलि निरंकारी ॥४॥
transliteration.en: saadhasa(n)gat jai sahaj ghar niramal nira(n)kaaree ||4||
transliteration.hi: साधसंगति जाइ सहज घरि निरमलि निरंकारी ॥४॥
transliteration.ipa: sɑt̪əsəŋGət̪ d͡ʒɑeɪ səhəd͡ʒ Gʰər nɪrəməl nɪrəŋkɑri.4.
transliteration.ur: سادھسںگت جاا سهج گھر نرمل نرںکاریِ ۔۔۴۔۔
